title.narrative: 5.3. SUBNATIONAL PROGRAMME COORDINATIONAND MANAGEMENT

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively manage the country programme in the departments of Cochabamba and Pando., which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively manage the country programme in the departments

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with guidance, tools and resources to effectively manage the country programme in thedepartments of Cochabamba and Pando.

description.narrative: Children and adolescents were incorporated into the public agenda at municipal and departmental levels in Cochabamba. As 2021 was a year marked by municipal and departmental elections, the UNICEF Cochabamba Zone Office created spaces for dialogue with newly elected authorities and positioned itself as a key ally in incorporating policies and programmes that fulfil child and adolescent rights in government planning and the public agenda. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/12/2021
